text:
e="preserve">Joseph Zhu Baoyu (July 2, 1921 – May 7, 2020) was a Chinese bishop of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Bishop Emeritus of Nanyang. The Chinese government considers him to be Titular Bishop of the Diocese. He was born in Pushan, Henan, China.
Zhu Baoyu, in February 2020 and was diagnosed with COVID-19 in Henan. He died on May 7, 2020 at the age of 98.
